tasks.label: Open last Arma 3 RPT
args: $rptPath = Join-Path $env:LOCALAPPDATA 'Arma 3'; $latestRpt = Get-ChildItem -Path $rptPath -Filter '*.rpt' -File | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | Select-Object -First 1; if ($latestRpt) { & $latestRpt.FullName } else { Write-Host 'No RPT file found' }
